DOC.brief_summary: This study determine Tyramine side effect patient receive 0.5mg , 1mg Rasagiline Placebo
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects Tyramine Patients Who Completed PRESTO Study .
DOC.criteria: Men woman idiopathic Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) meet inclusion criterion PRESTO , complete 26week PRESTO study . The subject available participate substudy immediately follow last PRESTO visit ( day ) . Subjects must continue PRESTO study drug morning Tyramine SubStudy . Subjects must provide separate inform consent participate Tyramine SubStudy . Subjects must history intracranial aneurysm stroke . Subjects uncontrolled hypertension , define systolic pressure > 160 mmHg , diastolic pressure > 90 mmHg .
